message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think you'll find it very valuable.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $120.  I'm confident this product will be a great value for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer. I'm still not sure I'm comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
